import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { BarChart3, TrendingUp, Target, User, Home, Calendar, DollarSign, AlertCircle, ChevronRight, Search, Bell } from 'lucide-react'; import './App.css'; const SportsGamblingApp = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState('home'); const [selectedSport, setSelectedSport] = useState('all'); const [selectedGame, setSelectedGame] = useState(null); // Mock data const upcomingGames = [ { id: 1, sport: 'NBA', homeTeam: 'Lakers', awayTeam: 'Celtics', homeOdds: -145, awayOdds: +125, spread: -3.5, total: 218.5, startTime: '7:30 PM ET', trend: 'hot', injuries: 1, value: true }, { id: 2, sport: 'NFL', homeTeam: '49ers', awayTeam: 'Cowboys', homeOdds: -110, awayOdds: -110, spread: -2.5, total: 47.5, startTime: '8:15 PM ET', trend: 'neutral', injuries: 0, value: false }, { id: 3, sport: 'NHL', homeTeam: 'Rangers', awayTeam: 'Bruins', homeOdds: +135, awayOdds: -155, spread: 1.5, total: 6.5, startTime: '7:00 PM ET', trend: 'cold', injuries: 2, value: true } ]; const activeBets = [ { id: 1, game: 'Warriors vs Nets', bet: 'Warriors -4.5', stake: 100, toWin: 91, status: 'live' }, { id: 2, game: 'Chiefs vs Bills', bet: 'Over 52.5', stake: 50, toWin: 45, status: 'pending' } ]; const userStats = { roi: '+12.4%', winRate: '54%', unitsWon: '+23.5', activeBets: 2 }; const renderHome = () => (
{/* Performance Summary */}

Active Bets

{activeBets.map(bet => (
{bet.game}
{bet.bet}
${bet.stake}
To win: ${bet.toWin}
{bet.status}
))}
{/* Value Alerts */}

Value Alerts

Lakers -3.5 vs Celtics
Rangers ML vs Bruins
{/* Today's Games */}

Today's Games

{upcomingGames .filter(game => selectedSport === 'all' || game.sport === selectedSport) .map(game => (
setSelectedGame(game)} >
{game.sport}
{game.value && ( VALUE )} {game.injuries > 0 && ( )} {game.startTime}
{game.awayTeam}
{game.awayOdds > 0 ? '+' : ''}{game.awayOdds}
vs

Spread: {game.spread > 0 ? '+' : ''}{game.spread} Total: {game.total} {game.trend === 'hot' ? 'ðŸ”¥ Hot' : game.trend === 'cold' ? 'â„ï¸ Cold' : 'âž– Neutral'}
))}
); const renderGameAnalysis = () => { if (!selectedGame) { return (

Select a game to view detailed analysis

); } return (
{/* Game Header */}
{selectedGame.sport}
{selectedGame.awayTeam}
{selectedGame.awayOdds > 0 ? '+' : ''}{selectedGame.awayOdds}

{selectedGame.startTime}

Points Per Game
112.4 vs 108.7
ATS Record
8-3 vs 5-6
{/* AI Insights */}

AI Insights

  • â€¢ {selectedGame.awayTeam} is 7-2 ATS in their last 9 road games
  • â€¢ {selectedGame.homeTeam} averaging 5 more PPG at home this season
  • â€¢ Historical head-to-head favors away team by 3.2 points
  • â€¢ Line has moved 1.5 points toward {selectedGame.homeTeam} (sharp money indicator)
{/* Line Movement */}

Line Movement

[Line movement chart would appear here]
); }; const renderAnalytics = () => (

Best Sport
NBA (+18.2%)
Best Bet Type
Spreads (+15.1%)

Home Favorites 62% Win Rate
Road Underdogs 48% Win Rate
Totals (Over) 51% Win Rate
); const renderBets = () => (

{bet.game}
{bet.bet}
${bet.stake}

)}

))}

); return (
{/* Header */}

Sports Analytics Pro

{selectedGame ? renderGameAnalysis() : ( <> {activeTab === 'home' && renderHome()} {activeTab === 'analytics' && renderAnalytics()} {activeTab === 'bets' && renderBets()} )}
{/* Bottom Navigation */}
); }; export default SportsGamblingApp;
